class PhotoTourRevisited[source]

PhotoTourRevisited(root:str, name:str, transform:Optional[Callable]=None, download:bool=False) :: PhotoTour

Learning Local Image Descriptors Data <http://phototour.cs.washington.edu/patches/default.htm>_ Dataset with for new evaluation protocol. Args: root (string): Root directory where images are. name (string): Name of the dataset to load. transform (callable, optional): A function/transform that takes in an PIL image and returns a transformed version. download (bool, optional): If true, downloads the dataset from the internet and puts it in root directory. If dataset is already downloaded, it is not downloaded again.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

read_interest_file[source]

read_interest_file(data_dir:str, info_file:str)

Return a Tensor containing the list of image ids Read the file and keep only the ID of the image point.
